summary: Vincent Andrew Schiavelli  was an American character actor in movies and on television.
full_text: Vincent Andrew Schiavelli  was an American character actor noted for his work on stage, screen, and television, often described as "the man with the sad eyes." He was notable for his numerous and often critically acclaimed supporting roles. Schiavelli was also well known for his height, standing 6 ft 6 in .
title: Vincent Schiavelli
